item.title: About
item.description: I’ve been playing Stafield recently, and I have found myself really enjoying outpost building. The information here started in various text files and google sheets, but I figured others might benefit from some of my notes, so I pulled this site together. There are already plenty of other websites out there with guides and articles, and I don’t look to replace any of that. I really just wanted a way to organize and view some data in a way that makes sense to me.

item.title: Adaptive Frame
item.description: Adaptive Frame is a Common Manufactured resource. One Adaptive Frame has a mass of 1.6 and is worth 24 credits. Purchase Crafting Industrial Workbench Simple Fabricator Supply Chain You can craft 1 Adaptive Frame using these resources: [map[Aluminum:1 Iron:1]] Industrial Workbench [map[Aluminum:1 Iron:1]] Simple Fabricator Purchase Adaptive Frame can be purchased at the following locations. Crafting You have a few different options for crafting Adaptive Frame. Industrial Workbench flowchart TD IndustrialWorkbench[ Industrial Workbench] Aluminum[ 1 Aluminum] Aluminum --> IndustrialWorkbench Iron[ 1 Iron] Iron --> IndustrialWorkbench Simple Fabricator flowchart TD SimpleFabricator[ Simple Fabricator] Power[5 Power] Power --> SimpleFabricator Aluminum[ 1 Aluminum] Aluminum --> SimpleFabricator Iron[ 1 Iron] Iron --> SimpleFabricator Supply Chain You can automate the manufactoring like this:

item.title: Adhesive
item.description: Adhesive is a Rare Organic resource. One Adhesive has a mass of 0.5 and is worth 12 credits. Purchase Farming Greenhouse Animal Husbandry Facility Purchase Adhesive can be purchased at the following locations. Jae Montreal at New Homestead on Titan in Sol (Store) Farming You have a few different options for farming Adhesive. Greenhouse The Standard, Commercial, and Industrial Greenhouse all use the same input ingredients and power requirements.

item.title: Bookmarks
item.description: Other sites/tools/resources. Digipick Solver - Tool for helping solve the Starfield Digipick puzzle mini-game. Starfield DB - Database for Starfield locations, factions, missions, and more. Inara - Companion site for Starfield. Game data, galleries, news and more… Starfield Game Maps - Starfield Game Guide with discovered and described Starfield Maps of systems and planets Hardcore Gamer - Another site with a large collection of Starfield information. In my travels/research I’ve come across a few different Google Sheets:

item.title: Toxin
item.description: Toxin is a Common Organic resource. One Toxin has a mass of 0.5 and is worth 8 credits. Purchase Farming Greenhouse Animal Husbandry Facility Purchase Toxin can be purchased at the following locations. Jae Montreal at New Homestead on Titan in Sol (Store) Farming You have a few different options for farming Toxin. Greenhouse The Standard, Commercial, and Industrial Greenhouse all use the same input ingredients and power requirements.
